```{r}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
#install.packages("serieseIMDB")
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

attribution_studies <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-08-12/attribution_studies.csv')
```

```{r}
new <- attribution_studies|>
  group_by(event_type) |>
  summarize(
    count = n()
  )


ggplot(data = new, aes(x = event_type, y = count)) +
  geom_col(fill = "orange") + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Event Type", y = "Count", title = "Extreme events represented in attribution studies")

```
